greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to choose a constant rooted partition of each part in a constant rooted partition of n such that the flattened sequence is also constant.
comment: A rooted partition of n is an integer partition of n - 1.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
program: (PARI) a(n)=if(n==1, 1, sumdiv(n-1, d, if(d==1, 1, numdiv(d-1)))) \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 26 2018
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Mar 26 2018
